name: Ultimate starter style guide UI kit – Untitled UI
description:
Kickstart any project with this super handy starter style guide UI kit.


We've taken the best color, typography, shadow, and effects styles from Untitled UI and packaged them up into a lightweight UI kit.


–––


Untitled UI is the largest UI kit and design system for Figma in the world. Kickstart any project, save thousands of hours, and level up as a designer.


✨ Learn more and preview the full version at untitledui.com ✨
